name: Crystal Warriors
synopsis: In the Kingdom of Ariel, four elemental crystals have long protected the land and its inhabitants, but an evil force has appeared to destroy this peace by stealing them! With the kingdom in turmoil, guide Princess Iris in her quest to recover the lost crystals from the evil Jyn. In this classic strategy game, arm your warriors and tame monsters to fight alongside you against Jyn’s armies! Do reconnaissance and arm your warriors in town. Fight and tame beasts to fight against your enemies! Over five unique classes to use against Jyn’s forces! Challenge a friend via local two-player multiplayer!
